title: How to Play Beat Saber

steps.headline: Get the game from SteamVR or Oculus Store.
steps.description: This is one of the most popular games in these stores, and should be close to the top of the list. You can search for it on your PC, or you can select it from the top of the list in the respective store. SteamVR games can be played on any VR headset; Oculus games only work on the Oculus headsets.

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: Search for Beat Saber in your library and click on it, then choose "Play" to play it.

steps.headline: Read the health notice.
steps.description: Playing Beat Saber requires some physical exercise, so it is important to take breaks. Once you have done so, you can start playing.

steps.headline: Choose a game mode.
steps.description: There are different levels, as well as single player mode, party mode, and arcade mode. Beat Saber has levels that consist of challenges you have to complete to level up. Single player mode allows you to play alone. Party mode allows you to trade off the VR headset every so often.

steps.headline: Choose the type of blocks.
steps.description: You can choose between classic and one saber.

steps.headline: Choose the song from the track list.
Choose the level mode.
steps.description: You can do normal, one saber, and no arrows. Normal mode will run the beat map with blocks you need to hit in the direction of the arrows. One saber mode gives you only one saber to slash blocks. There will not be two different colors in this case. No arrows will run the beat map but letting you slash the blocks in any direction.

steps.headline: Slash the blocks as they come at you to the beat of the music.
steps.description: The more on beat you are, the more points you get. Slash them in the direction of the arrow with the correct colored saber.

steps.headline: Avoid obstacles.
steps.description: Move your head so that walls coming at you will not hit you. Keep on slashing blocks while doing this. Your saber can pass through obstacles, and you will feel a vibration when they are in one.

steps.headline: Avoid mines.
steps.description: If you slash these, you will lose your combo.

steps.headline: Keep on slashing blocks.
steps.description: If you miss, you will lose your combo.

steps.headline: Check your score and letter grade at the end.
steps.description: Try to make your score higher. If you miss too many blocks, then you will fail the level, unless if "No fail" is enabled.

steps.headline: Look for the song pack online.
steps.description: Custom songs either have a level extension (.bsl) or come in a compressed folder. Once you have it downloaded, proceed below.

steps.headline: Open the Beat Saber level editor.
steps.description: To do so, start Beat Saber and choose "Level editor". The level editor is not available in VR, so go to your PC for the next steps.

steps.headline: Choose the .bsl file on your PC.
Choose EXPORT.
steps.description: This will send your level to the Custom Levels folder.

steps.headline: Enjoy the custom level.
steps.description: To play it, go to "Solo" on the Beat Saber home screen, choose "Custom Levels", choose the level, difficulty, and configure level options, and choose PLAY.

steps.headline: Uncompress the folder.
steps.description: To do so, right-click then choose "Extract All". Give the folder a meaningful name and choose Extract.

steps.headline: Locate the custom levels folder.
steps.description: On Steam, this is located at %ProgramFiles(x86)%\Steam\Steamapps\common\Beat Saber\CustomLevels\.

steps.headline: Drag the uncompressed folder into the custom levels folder.
steps.description: This will move the custom level into Beat Saber.

steps.headline: Restart Beat Saber.
steps.description: Press Alt+F4 to kill it, then choose Beat Saber again from the home screen.

steps.headline: Enjoy the custom level.
steps.description: To play it, go to "Solo" on the Beat Saber home screen, choose "Custom Levels", choose the level, difficulty, and configure level options, and choose PLAY.

text: Installing Beat Saber Get the game from SteamVR or Oculus Store. This is one of the most popular games in these stores, and should be close to the top of the list. You can search for it on your PC, or you can select it from the top of the list in the respective store. SteamVR games can be played on any VR headset; Oculus games only work on the Oculus headsets. Launch the game. Search for Beat Saber in your library and click on it, then choose "Play" to play it. Read the health notice. Playing Beat Saber requires some physical exercise, so it is important to take breaks. Once you have done so, you can start playing. Playing Beat Saber Choose a game mode. There are different levels, as well as single player mode, party mode, and arcade mode. Beat Saber has levels that consist of challenges you have to complete to level up. Single player mode allows you to play alone. Party mode allows you to trade off the VR headset every so often. Choose the type of blocks. You can choose between classic and one saber. Choose the song from the track list.  Choose the difficulty.  Choose the level mode. You can do normal, one saber, and no arrows. Normal mode will run the beat map with blocks you need to hit in the direction of the arrows. One saber mode gives you only one saber to slash blocks. There will not be two different colors in this case. No arrows will run the beat map but letting you slash the blocks in any direction. Choose "Play".  Slash the blocks as they come at you to the beat of the music. The more on beat you are, the more points you get. Slash them in the direction of the arrow with the correct colored saber. Avoid obstacles. Move your head so that walls coming at you will not hit you. Keep on slashing blocks while doing this. Your saber can pass through obstacles, and you will feel a vibration when they are in one. Avoid mines. If you slash these, you will lose your combo. Keep on slashing blocks. If you miss, you will lose your combo. Check your score and letter grade at the end. Try to make your score higher. If you miss too many blocks, then you will fail the level, unless if "No fail" is enabled. Installing Custom Songs Look for the song pack online. Custom songs either have a level extension (.bsl) or come in a compressed folder. Once you have it downloaded, proceed below. Open the Beat Saber level editor. To do so, start Beat Saber and choose "Level editor". The level editor is not available in VR, so go to your PC for the next steps. Click on the folder.  Choose OPEN.  Choose the .bsl file on your PC.  Choose EXPORT. This will send your level to the Custom Levels folder. Enjoy the custom level. To play it, go to "Solo" on the Beat Saber home screen, choose "Custom Levels", choose the level, difficulty, and configure level options, and choose PLAY. Uncompress the folder. To do so, right-click then choose "Extract All". Give the folder a meaningful name and choose Extract. Locate the custom levels folder. On Steam, this is located at %ProgramFiles(x86)%\Steam\Steamapps\common\Beat Saber\CustomLevels\. Drag the uncompressed folder into the custom levels folder. This will move the custom level into Beat Saber. Restart Beat Saber. Press Alt+F4 to kill it, then choose Beat Saber again from the home screen. Enjoy the custom level. To play it, go to "Solo" on the Beat Saber home screen, choose "Custom Levels", choose the level, difficulty, and configure level options, and choose PLAY.
